okay. Follow the instructions here to check that the DVD burned okay: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Installation/CDIntegrityCheck?action=show&redirect=CDIntegrityCheck
if the integrity check says your media is fine, try booting in safe graphics mode (second option on the boot menu instead of the first)
yes. Put the .iso and the Wubi installer in the same folder
if it starts downloading the amd64 .iso instead of using the one you downloaded, start wubi with the --32bit argument (according to the wubi FAQ)
